sentences.sContent: When Barbieux started his blog, his aspirations were small; he simply hoped to communicate with a few people.
sentences.sCn: 当巴布开始他的博客时，他的期望并不大。他只是希望能与几个人交流。

trans.tranOther: a web page containing information or opinions from a particular person or about a particular subject, to which new information is added regularly
